Summary Note:
The RM met Fournier Garcia Nicolas during a business conference in Paris. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Fournier Garcia Nicolas is a 68 year old retired Private Banker from France.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Fournier Garcia Nicolas is currently divorced. His children are named Pierre, Jade and Louis.
Education Background:
Fournier received his secondary school diploma from Lycée Montaigne in 1976.
Fournier finished his studies at École Nationale d'Administration (ENA) in 1981.
Occupation History:
Fournier Garcia Nicolas is a seasoned professional with over 45 years of experience.
At Société Générale Private Banking, Fournier Garcia Nicolas held the position of Financial Advisor from 1980 to 1983, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Société Générale Private Banking as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1985 to 1986.
He spent 2 years working as a Wealth Manager at Crédit Agricole Private Banking, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
His next role was as a Family Office Executive at La Banque Postale Private Banking, where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 1990 to 1995.
Fournier Garcia Nicolas retired after holding the position of Private Banker at Crédit Agricole Private Banking from 1997 to 2017.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1310000 EUR.
He has villa located in Lille, worth 2620000 EUR.

He purchased flat in Besançon, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1220000 EUR.
Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Brest, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The condo is valued at 1730000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
